metadata.title: CVE-2020-8002 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
A NULL pointer dereference in vrend_renderer.c in virglrenderer through0.8.1 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via commands thatattempt to launch a grid without previously providing a Compute Shader(CS).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8002` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvirglrenderer1 - 0.8.2-1
virgl-server - 0.8.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: virglrenderer package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.2-1').
